content: cc * k2 m1l repeat from * till end of round 192 216 236 270 288 306 324 360 376 396 sts you are done with the third yoke increase second slip_stitch section round 1 *sl1pwyb k3 mc repeat from * till end of round round 2 *k1 cc sl3pwyb repeat from * till end of round repeat rounds 1-2 3 times total with cc k 2 rounds even with mc k 2 rounds even you are done with the second slip_stitch section @2020 caroline hegwer 11 notting hill third slip_stitch section round 1 sl2pwyb *k1 cc sl3pwyb repeat from * till last 2 stitches k1 cc sl1pwyb rounds 2-3 with mc k round 4 *k1 cc sl3pwyb repeat from * till end of round rounds 5-6 with mc k round 7 same as round 1 rounds 8-9 with mc k round 10 with cc k break cc rounds 11-12 with mc k you are done with the third slip_stitch section from this point on you will only be using mc fourth yoke increase size 1 only * k8 m1l repeat from * till end of round 216 sts size 2 only * k9 m1l repeat from * till end of round 240 sts size 3 only k7 m1l x5 k8 m1l x3 x4 268 sts @2020 caroline hegwer 12 notting hill size 4 only k13 m1l k14 m1l x10 290 sts size 5 only * k9 m1l repeat from * till end of round 320 sts size 6 only * k9 m1l repeat from * till end of round 340 sts size 7 only k7 m1l x22 k8 m1l k7 m1l x22 k8 m1l 370 sts size 8 only * k10 m1l repeat from * till end of round 396 sts size 9 only k9 m1l x6 k8 m1l x5 x4 420 sts size 10 only k7 m1l x2 k8 m1l x18 450 sts you are done with the fourth yoke increase finishing the yoke k every round even without increasing until yoke measures 7 3/4 8 8 1/4 8 1/2 8 3/4 9 9 1/4 9 1/2 9 3/4 10 from center front co edge before you finish the yoke try the sweater on knitting a few more row or a few less is fine the measurements are only a guideline @2020 caroline hegwer 13 notting hill @2020 caroline hegwer 14 notting hill divide for body and sleeves k 35 40 45 48 53 56 61 66 70 75 sts place next 38 40 44 49 54 58 63 66 70 75 sts on a holder using the cable cast on co 6 6 6 7 6 8 7
